Localization.Name: Roussimoff Rehabilitation Systems
Localization.Description: Roussimoff Rehabilitation Systems (RRS) is an Earth-based corporation that provides rehabilitation services, personal body armor and defensive systems throughout the UEE. Their arms division is responsible for a groundbreaking series of new weaponry designed to incapacitate opponents without taking lives.

English.Name: Roussimoff Rehabilitation Systems
English.Description: Roussimoff Rehabilitation Systems (RRS) is an Earth-based corporation that provides rehabilitation services, personal body armor and defensive systems throughout the UEE. Their arms division is responsible for a groundbreaking series of new weaponry designed to incapacitate opponents without taking lives.

Localization.Name: Morozov-SH Legs Crusader Edition
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Heavy Armor
Damage Reduction: 40%
Temp. Rating: -90 / 115 °C
Radiation Protection: 26800 REM
Radiation Scrub Rate: 145.8 REM/s
Carrying Capacity: 7.5K µSCU

Featuring fortified armor plating, special anti-rip protective padding and ample storage, the Morozov-SH is ready to overcome all kinds of adversity. After consulting with security professionals, RRS added a unique high protective collar and a lightweight inner lining based on their recommendation; making the Morozov-SH both comfortable and a battlefield stalwart. The Crusader Edition was made specifically for the company's security services.
